Articles.Content:
I don't get it. I have a similar Plane, like  this one,  but when i'm on the runway I can push thrust to its limit but the plane isn't moving at all.  I tried "b" for the brakes but it doesn't make a difference. The plane stays where it is. The planes engines are running at their top, the game shows that the engines are running but nothing happens. The plane isn't rolling at all.

What did I forgot ?

Right-click on the engine, see how much force it's exerting ... and make sure the exhaust isn't hitting some other part of the plane, because that tends to eat ALL the thrust.

By the way, pictures of the actual plane?

There it is   screenshot1 screenshot2

Edited March 18, 2018 by edewolf
The rear fins are blocking your thrust, you can't have any parts behind the engines like that.
Yes that was the problem. thanks
